mapper.insert: insert into files values(files_seq.nextval, (select max(bo_idx) + 1 from board), #{class_idx}, #{file_link}, #{file_name}, #{file_role})
mapper.select: select file_idx, bo_idx, class_idx, file_link, file_name, file_role from files where file_idx = #{file_idx}
